headline.main: Writer Captured in Libya Tells of Desert Tank Battle; CAPTURED WRITER TELLS OF BATTLE

lead_paragraph: The following is the first of a series of articles by a correspondent of THE NEW YORK TIMES who was captured in Libya six months ago and has just returned to this country.
